Name: Jadeplume Terrorshroom
Title: "Lord of Fungi" Jadeplume Terrorshroom
Desc: If you keep silent and listen closely, you can hear the sound of the ruler of the Shroom-Kin inspecting its territory...
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Jadeplume Terrorshroom

27013.Name: Feather Spreading
27013.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], then consumes all <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127011]</color> stacks. For each stack consumed, this instance deals +1 DMG.

C127011.Name: Radical Vitality
C127011.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character deals or takes Elemental DMG:</color> Gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Radical Vitality</color>. (Max 3 stacks)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Radical Vitality</color> stacks reach the maximum limit, they will be cleared and the character will lose all Energy.

27014.Name: Radical Vitality
27014.Desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127011]</color>.

C127011.Name: Radical Vitality
C127011.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character deals or takes Elemental DMG:</color> Gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Radical Vitality</color>. (Max 3 stacks)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Radical Vitality</color> stacks reach the maximum limit, they will be cleared and the character will lose all Energy.
